Action.author: tuand
Action.body: Fabric has code for a CLI create channel command at hyperledger/fabric/peer/channel/create.go

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~rickr : It's not clear to me how FAB-1875 is blocking you. Can you clarify?

Action.author: rickr
Action.body: ahh that was an over month ago comment

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Does that mean that (a) you know now that it's not blocking you, or (b) that you cannot recall how it's blocking you?

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: (The second option is, of course, a valid answer.)
